analysis.key_quote: Proposals that allow employees to be reclassified into an at-will status—stripped of due process and vulnerable to politically motivated firings—are a direct attack on that foundation.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the civil service, the loss of due process protections, and the importance of maintaining a merit-based system. These themes indicate a strong opposition to the rule.
